name: HOKM ( حکم )
description:
HOKM is a classy persian trick playing cards game but we have designed it with a modern touch. It requires strategy, patience and lot of skill.

Both Online Multiplayer and Offline modes are available.

::Design::
- Universal application designed for both iPhone and iPad.

:: Play ::
- Single player game: Play against 3 computer players.
- Multi Player game : Play against players online or your friends

:: Features ::
- 8 eye-catching theme with further option of selecting your own card deck.
- Intuitive sound effects. You can play your iOS device songs along with the game.
- Easily customise your Game Experience by changing game speed and player names displayed.
- Crystal clear retina display supported.
- Multitasking supported. So you can easily resume your game.
- Invite your friends via SMS/Email
